revised_title: Synthesis of Tetracycline: A Bakerian Lecture on Approaches and Challenges
tldr: This article discusses the synthesis of tetracycline, a group of important medicinal compounds. The author presents various approaches to constructing the tetracycline molecule, focusing on the challenges of synthesizing it using different methods. The article highlights the importance of considering stereochemistry and the sensitivity of tetracyclines to acid and base conditions during the synthesis process.
